text: thumb == Offseason == * September 19, 1944: Freddie Fitzsimmons' managerial contract was extended for 1945. * February 11, 1945: Jimmie Foxx was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Jimmie Foxx page at Baseball Reference * Prior to 1945 season (exact date unknown) **Tommy Lasorda was signed as an amateur free agent by the Phillies.Tommy Lasorda page at Baseball Reference **Carl Sawatski was signed as an amateur free agent by the Phillies.Carl Sawatski page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === 1945 Phillies program listing team members serving in World War II * May 8, 1945: Buster Adams was traded by the Phillies to the St. Louis Cardinals for Glenn Crawford and John Antonelli.Glenn Crawford page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
